articles.title: Crypto VC Giant Andreessen Horowitz Raises $15 Billion to Help America 'Win' Tech Race
articles.description: Major crypto investor Andreessen Horowitz raised $15 billion across multiple funds to propel technology bets and help boost America's prospects.

articles.title: BNY Debuts Tokenized Deposits for Institutions and 'Digital Natives'
articles.description: BNY, the world’s largest custodian bank, signaled that it will begin issuing digital representations of customers’ deposits on the blockchain.

articles.title: Price predictions 1/9: BTC, ETH, XRP, BNB, SOL, DOGE, ADA, BCH, LINK, HYPE
articles.description: Buyers are attempting to defend the near-term support in Bitcoin and select major altcoins, but the bears have not given up and continue to exert pressure near the intraday range highs.

articles.title: BNY launches tokenized deposits amid TradFi rush into blockchain and crypto
articles.description: The service is available for institutional clients through an in-house permissioned blockchain, BNY said on Friday.

articles.title: Crypto exchange OKX cuts institutional staff amid global restructuring
articles.description: The exchange has overhauled its institutional business as part of a broader restructuring, with approximately one-third of its sales team exiting, according to one source.

articles.title: Ethereum co-founder reiterates support for Roman Storm, citing privacy
articles.description: The Tornado Cash developer was found guilty of operating an unlicensed transmitter business in August and could still be retried on two counts on which a jury deadlocked.

articles.title: Ethereum Founder Vitalik Buterin Backs Convicted Dev, Calls Privacy 'Essential Protection'
articles.description: Ethereum co-founder Vitalik Buterin publicly backed convicted Tornado Cash developer Roman Storm, calling privacy tools a human right.

articles.title: Security expert Bruce Schneier ‘guarantees’ governments are bulk spying with AI
articles.description: From PRISM to AI, mass surveillance has only grown more powerful. Bruce Schneier warns the post-Snowden world may be entering an even darker phase.
